sources.title: The Home Guard (1941)
sources.description: Gandy Goose joins the home guard, a ramshackle bunch of barnyard creatures that mostly march and drill. At one point, Gandy is menaced by a fifth columnist, who travels in a literal fifth column from a porch. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-home-guard-1941/

metadata.Plot: Gandy Goose joins the home guard, a ramshackle bunch of barnyard creatures that mostly march and drill. At one point, Gandy is menaced by a fifth columnist, who travels in a literal fifth column from a porch.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
